title: Potential Energy and Kinetic Energy
question: 哪个是 Gravitational potential energy / Tenaga keupayaan graviti 的formula ?
哪个是 Elastic potential energy / Tenaga keupayaan kenyal 的formula ?
哪个是 Kinetic energy / Tenaga kinetik 的formula ?

What is the gravitational potential energy of a 2 kg object lifted to a height of 5 m? (Take g = 10 m/s²)
Apakah tenaga keupayaan graviti bagi objek 2 kg yang diangkat setinggi 5 m? (g = 10 m/s²)

A 1.5 kg book is on a table 0.75 m high. Calculate its GPE. (g = 10 m/s²)
Sebuah buku berjisim 1.5 kg berada di atas meja setinggi 0.75 m. Kira tenaga keupayaan graviti buku itu. (g = 10 m/s²)

A 2 kg object is lifted to a height of 150 cm. What is the gravitational potential energy? (g = 10 m/s²)
Sebuah objek 2 kg diangkat setinggi 150 cm. Apakah tenaga keupayaan graviti? (g = 10 m/s²)

A 500 g object is raised to a height of 1.2 m. What is the gravitational potential energy? (g = 10 m/s²)
Sebuah objek 500 g diangkat setinggi 1.2 m. Apakah tenaga keupayaan graviti? (g = 10 m/s²)

A boy lifts a 3 kg bag onto a table 75 cm high. What is its GPE? (g = 10 m/s²)
Seorang budak mengangkat beg 3 kg ke atas meja setinggi 75 cm. Apakah tenaga keupayaan graviti? (g = 10 m/s²)

A cat of mass 2.5 kg jumps to a window 1.5 m above the ground. Calculate its GPE. (g = 10 m/s²)
Seekor kucing berjisim 2.5 kg melompat ke tingkap 1.5 m tinggi dari tanah. Kira tenaga keupayaan graviti. (g = 10 m/s²)

A 2500 g box is lifted onto a shelf 60 cm high. Find its GPE. (g = 10 m/s²)
Sebuah kotak 2500 g diangkat ke rak setinggi 60 cm. Cari tenaga keupayaan graviti. (g = 10 m/s²)

A coconut of mass 1.8 kg falls from a tree 250 cm tall. What was its GPE before falling? (g = 10 m/s²)
Sebiji kelapa berjisim 1.8 kg jatuh dari pokok setinggi 250 cm. Berapakah tenaga keupayaan graviti sebelum jatuh? (g = 10 m/s²)

A spring is stretched from 20 cm to 28 cm by a 400 g object. What is the elastic potential energy stored?
Sebuah spring diregangkan dari 20 cm ke 28 cm oleh objek 400 g. Apakah tenaga keupayaan kenyal yang disimpan?

A 1.5 kg object compresses a spring from 30 cm to 20 cm. Find the elastic potential energy stored. 
Sebuah objek 1.5 kg memampatkan spring dari 30 cm ke 20 cm. Berapakah tenaga keupayaan kenyal yang disimpan?

A spring is stretched from 12 cm to 15 cm by a 250 g mass. Calculate its EPE. (g = 10 m/s²)
Sebuah spring diregangkan dari 12 cm ke 15 cm oleh objek 250 g. Hitung tenaga keupayaan kenyal.

A force of 15 N compresses a spring by 30 cm. What is the elastic potential energy stored?
Satu daya sebanyak 15 N memampatkan spring sejauh 30 cm. Apakah tenaga keupayaan kenyal?

The original length of spring T is 25 cm. When a force of 30 N is applied, the spring is compressed to 15 cm.
Calculate the elastic potential energy stored in spring T.
Panjang asal spring T ialah 25 cm. Apabila satu daya 30 N dikenakan, spring dimampatkan kepada 15 cm.
Kira tenaga keupayaan kenyal yang disimpan dalam spring T.

Spring R has an original length of 40 cm. After a force of 50 N is applied, it is compressed to 35 cm.
Find the elastic potential energy stored in spring R.
Spring R mempunyai panjang asal 40 cm. Selepas satu daya 50 N dikenakan, panjangnya menjadi 35 cm.
Kira tenaga keupayaan kenyal yang disimpan dalam spring R.

Calculate the kinetic energy of a tennis ball of mass 150 g moving at 20 m s⁻¹.
Kira tenaga kinetik bagi sebiji bola tenis berjisim 150 g yang bergerak pada kelajuan 20 m s⁻¹.

A car has a mass of 1200 kg and moves at a velocity of 15 m s⁻¹.
Calculate its kinetic energy.
Sebuah kereta berjisim 1200 kg bergerak pada kelajuan 15 m s⁻¹.
Kira tenaga kinetiknya.

An insect of mass 5 g flies with a velocity of 3 m s⁻¹. What is its kinetic energy?
Seekor serangga berjisim 5 g terbang pada kelajuan 3 m s⁻¹. Apakah tenaga kinetiknya?

A boy throws a 600 g basketball at a speed of 12 m s⁻¹. What is the kinetic energy of the ball?
Seorang budak membaling bola keranjang berjisim 600 g dengan halaju 12 m s⁻¹. Apakah tenaga kinetik bola tersebut?

An object of 2.5 kg slides across a smooth floor at 10 m s⁻¹. Calculate its kinetic energy.
Sebuah objek berjisim 2.5 kg meluncur atas lantai licin dengan kelajuan 10 m s⁻¹. Kira tenaga kinetiknya.

A bird with mass 200 g is flying at 6 m s⁻¹. What is its kinetic energy?
Seekor burung berjisim 200 g sedang terbang pada kelajuan 6 m s⁻¹. Apakah tenaga kinetik burung itu?
